getCaloriesPerMinute

public static int getCaloriesPerMinute(int stepsPerMinute,
                                       boolean isMale,
                                       int weight,
                                       int height)
Return calories count per minute

Parameters:
stepsPerMinute - steps in particular minute.
isMale - set parameter to true if the person is male. false otherwise.
weight - person's weight in kg.
height - person's height in cm.
Returns:
calories count.

distance in meters.
